name: Crackshot Free
description:
The world has been invaded by clinging multi-coloured bubbles and the ladies of planet earth need brave heroes to hose their troubles away!!

Fortunately they are desperate and willing to pay a $3 per bubble bounty!

Time to make your fortune in the burgening business of babe hosing!?!

If you are skilful enough with your hose, you may earn yourself a balloon show!

Ads will pop up every few levels or so... 

Only free on Android!
